workflow-report.title: workflow report
workflow-report.description: a HTML report document detailing the primary findings of the workflow

read-stats-per-file.title: Per file read stats
read-stats-per-file.description: A TSV with per file read stats, including all samples.

read-stats-per-read.title: Read stats
read-stats-per-read.description: A TSV with per read stats, including all samples.

run-ids.title: Run ID's
run-ids.description: List of run IDs present in reads.

metamap.title: Meta map json
metamap.description: Metadata used in workflow presented in a JSON.

sample-data.title: Concatenated sequence data
sample-data.description: Per sample reads concatenated in to one FASTQ file.

transcriptome.title: Assembled transcriptome
transcriptome.description: Per sample assembled transcriptome.  Not output if a reference annotation was supplied

merged_transcriptome.title: Annotated assembled transcriptome
merged_transcriptome.description: Per sample annotated assembled transcriptome. Only output if a reference annotation was supplied

dge-results-tsv.title: Differential gene expression results
dge-results-tsv.description: This is a gene-level result file that describes genes and their probability of showing differential expression between experimental conditions.

dge-report-pdf.title: Differential gene expression report
dge-report-pdf.description: Summary report of differential gene expression analysis as a PDF.

dtu-gene-tsv.title: Differential transcript usage gene TSV
dtu-gene-tsv.description: This is a gene-level result file from DEXSeq that lists annotated genes and their probabilities of differential expression.

dtu-report-pdf.title: Differential transcript usage report
dtu-report-pdf.description: Summary report of differential transcript usage results as a PDF.

dtu-transcript.title: Differential transcript usage TSV
dtu-transcript.description: This is a transcript-level result file from DEXSeq that lists annotated genes and their probabilities of differential expression.

dtu-stageR.title: Differential transcript usage stageR TSV
dtu-stageR.description: This is the output from StageR and it shows both gene and transcript probabilities of differential expression

dexseq.title: Differential transcript usage DEXSeq TSV
dexseq.description: The complete output from the DEXSeq-analysis, shows both gene and transcript probabilities of differential expression.

gene_counts.title: Gene counts
gene_counts.description: Raw gene counts created by the Salmon tool, before filtering.

gene_counts_per_million.title: Gene counts per million
gene_counts_per_million.description: This file shows counts per million (CPM) of the raw gene counts to facilitate comparisons across samples.

transcript_counts.title: Transcript counts
transcript_counts.description: Raw transcript counts created by the Salmon tool, before filtering. Includes reference to the associated gene ID.

tpm_transcript_counts.title: Transcript per million counts
tpm_transcript_counts.description: This file shows transcripts per million (TPM) of the raw counts to facilitate comparisons across samples.

transcipt_counts_filtered.title: Transcript counts filtered
transcipt_counts_filtered.description: Filtered transcript counts, used for differential transcript usage analysis. Includes a reference to the associated gene ID.

transcripts_table.title: Transcript info table
transcripts_table.description: This file details each isoform that was reconstructed from the input reads. It contains a subset of columns from the .tmap output from [gffcompare](https://ccb.jhu.edu/software/stringtie/gffcompare.shtml)

final_non_redundant_transcriptome.title: Final non redundant transcriptome
final_non_redundant_transcriptome.description: Transcripts that were used for differential expression analysis including novel transcripts with the identifiers used for DE analysis. Only applicable when the ref_transcriptome parameter is not provided.

reference-index.title: Index of reference FASTA file
reference-index.description: Reference genome index of the FASTA file required for IGV config.

reference-gzi-index.title: GZI index of the reference FASTA file
reference-gzi-index.description: GZI Index of the reference FASTA file.

igv-config.title: JSON configuration file for IGV browser
igv-config.description: JSON configuration file to be loaded in IGV for visualising alignments against the reference.

minimap2-bam.title: BAM file (minimap2)
minimap2-bam.description: BAM file generated from mapping input reads to the reference.

minimap2-index.title: BAM index file (minimap2)
minimap2-index.description: Index file generated from mapping input reads to the reference.
